# robots.txt for RestaurantAI Platform

User-agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /builder
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /restaurant/dashboard
Disallow: /super-admin/

# Allow search engines to index restaurant websites
Allow: /website/
Allow: /barcode/

# Sitemap location (update with your actual domain)
Sitemap: https://restaurantaai.com/sitemap.xml
